attributes.action: Katie hopkins should be examined under the mental health Act as I believe she is a danger to herself and others
attributes.additional_details: I believe that Katie Hopkins is suffering from a form of mental health that requires her to be examined as I believe that she is a public figure who is a danger to herself. She is putting herself at risk due to the outbursts and sweeping statements stem from a form of mental health problem. For example some form of schizoaffective disorder!
